p: It could also inherit from generation to generation. HWW contains a variety of chemical, physical, or biological compositions, which may cause permanent damage to cell structure or function, prevent growth, cause embryo, and even cause embryo death. Reflected on the macrolevel, the harm caused by HWW mainly affects in microcephaly, cardiac and facial edema, and axials. Most importantly, it can cause teratogenesis, which means that if a mother was deformed, the probability of child malformation will be particularly large [48].
